name: HackerRank
headline: Accelerate the World's Innovation
description: HackerRank, the developer skills company, helps businesses attract, evaluate and hire the best technical talent from around the world. More than 2,800 customers across all industries, including over 25% of the Fortune 100, rely on HackerRank to raise their hiring bars. More than 18 million developers (approximately 40% of the global developer population) trust HackerRank to learn and showcase their coding skills. Every second, two developers complete a HackerRank code submission, or 185,000 per day.
markdown:
raw_markdown="Introducing HackerRank ASTRA: an AI benchmark to evaluate LLM performance across the SDLC

# Skills speak louder than words
We help companies develop the strongest tech teams around. We help candidates sharpen their tech skills and pursue job opportunities.
[Get started for free](http://hackerrank.com/<https:/www.hackerrank.com/get-started/>)[Request Demo](http://hackerrank.com/</request-demo>)
Over 40% of developers worldwide and 3,000 companies use HackerRank
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b22208f1a1fefa8a2_AirBnB-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b22208f1a1fefa817_Stripe-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f6f4bb18a3ca707ac771_linkedin.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6bae7ad199a36794eb_Atlassian-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f76721b5766b2190fe7d_ibm.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6bc5556b277d750a69_Doordash-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6a9a5cd6110dc622db_Snap-color.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f815d46542504f9cee31_adobe.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f95eb1c857f73c0ec226_paypal.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f9e10d903ef8395e299a_goldmansachs.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b45d72f82c00180d2_Canva-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b22208f1a1fefa8a2_AirBnB-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b22208f1a1fefa817_Stripe-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f6f4bb18a3ca707ac771_linkedin.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6bae7ad199a36794eb_Atlassian-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f76721b5766b2190fe7d_ibm.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6bc5556b277d750a69_Doordash-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6a9a5cd6110dc622db_Snap-color.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f815d46542504f9cee31_adobe.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f95eb1c857f73c0ec226_paypal.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f9e10d903ef8395e299a_goldmansachs.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b45d72f82c00180d2_Canva-BW.svg)
It's not a pipeline problem. **_It's a spotlight problem._**
Tech hiring needs a reset. From prepping for jobs and practicing coding to running a world-class technical interview, give developers the tools they need to showcase their skills, passion, and potential.
[Request a demo](http://hackerrank.com/</request-demo>)
Coding practice
## Explore and expand your skills.
Every idea has a first line of code. Prep for jobs and sharpen your skills alongside a global community of developers. Access the content you need to develop new skills – and land the job you’ve dreamed of.
[Sign up and practice](http://hackerrank.com/<https:/www.hackerrank.com/auth/signup/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/677ff2aeab165414693c62b4_homeOld_community.avif)
Coding tests
## ** _Join the movement._** Screen on skills.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/677ff866cf2a83769a056475_home_ScreenFlip_resume.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/677ff866c82d660447b021cc_home_ScreenFlip_report.avif)
## Leave the binary tree behind
Build coding questions using our library of dev-friendly content that challenges them to solve the problems they’d actually tackle on the job.
[Start free trial➜](http://hackerrank.com/</get-started/hire-now>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/677ef5d66ffea04944141ab9_screenshot_library-1000.webp)
## Focus on what really matters: the code
Build skills-based coding tests with tech problems a developer would encounter on the job — and hire the team behind your next big idea.
[Request a demo➜](http://hackerrank.com/</request-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/677ff27d425b27ee767ac63b_homeOld_integrity.avif)
## Identify top contenders
Identify top contenders and invite them to meet your team using data-driven decisions that help level the playing field for developers everywhere.
[Learn more➜](http://hackerrank.com/</products/screen>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/677ff27dd3d7c830d8cfb048_homeOld_report.avif)
TEchnical interviews
Interview like it’s **_2025_**
Ditch out of reach and out of touch interview questions about golf balls and 747s — and turn off your clunky screen share for good. Code, create, and collaborate with an IDE built to showcase real-world skills in a real-world environment.
[Learn more](http://hackerrank.com/</products/interview>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787dc6f4b88704569dc3c3a_tool1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787dc6f4a00740c49b4361f_tool2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787dc6f4b87e1badc6f8799_tool3.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787dc6f181c45a97d394319_tool4.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787dc6f40564a6c26a0b475_tool5.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787dc6f638ea2c6880f5974_tool6.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787dc6f3b96d13b975c6088_tool7.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787dbe74f49c6423d3ef5be_interview-2.avif)
### Every company is a tech company. **_We’re here to help them all._**
More than 3,000 tech teams, representing all industries and from countries around the world, trust HackerRank to connect with developers and add cutting-edge skills to their teams.That includes 25% of the Fortune 100 — and that moonshot startup that just came out of stealth.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787ead3bad049acd99c5b3b_ubs_black.png)
We're discovering new ways of attracting candidates to the organization. By using HackerRank, we're actually improving the tech image of UBS.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787eb911a727f0e460c9125_vmware_black.png)
HackerRank has actually allowed us to look for diamonds in the rough that our old process didn't give us the time or resources to look for.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787ec83e5d4dc64866a7f2f_booking_black.png)
We're promoting our jobs to a much wider audience and allowing candidates to be selected for interviews purely based on the merit of their coding abilities.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787ec8376622292b37ba91b_doordash_black.png)
We cut down hiring time by months, which was huge for us. We owe that to HackerRank.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787ec839d5dcda12fec22df_vanguard_black.png)
HackerRank is a critical piece of our candidate's experience, and hitting the right tone is just as important as identifying good candidates.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787ec83b1f12279501097a0_wish_black.png)
HackerRank has been a huge help in making it easy to assess the skills of all the candidates we interview. Without it, the process of scaling our engineering team would have been very cumbersome.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b22208f1a1fefa8a2_AirBnB-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b22208f1a1fefa817_Stripe-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f6f4bb18a3ca707ac771_linkedin.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6bae7ad199a36794eb_Atlassian-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f76721b5766b2190fe7d_ibm.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6bc5556b277d750a69_Doordash-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6a9a5cd6110dc622db_Snap-color.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f815d46542504f9cee31_adobe.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f95eb1c857f73c0ec226_paypal.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f9e10d903ef8395e299a_goldmansachs.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b45d72f82c00180d2_Canva-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b22208f1a1fefa8a2_AirBnB-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b22208f1a1fefa817_Stripe-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f6f4bb18a3ca707ac771_linkedin.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6bae7ad199a36794eb_Atlassian-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f76721b5766b2190fe7d_ibm.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6bc5556b277d750a69_Doordash-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6a9a5cd6110dc622db_Snap-color.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f815d46542504f9cee31_adobe.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f95eb1c857f73c0ec226_paypal.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f9e10d903ef8395e299a_goldmansachs.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b45d72f82c00180d2_Canva-BW.svg)
Practice coding challenges and **_prepare for interviews_**
Start practicing your skills now and land the job of your dreams.
[Join the Community](http://hackerrank.com/<https:/www.hackerrank.com/signup/>)
Get started **_hiring with HackerRank_**
Join thousands of companies embracing the new way to hire and upskill developers.

# Skills speak louder than words
We help companies develop the strongest tech teams around. We help candidates sharpen their tech skills and pursue job opportunities.
Get started for free⟨9⟩Request Demo⟨8⟩
Over 40% of developers worldwide and 3,000 companies use HackerRank
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b22208f1a1fefa8a2_AirBnB-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b22208f1a1fefa817_Stripe-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f6f4bb18a3ca707ac771_linkedin.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6bae7ad199a36794eb_Atlassian-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f76721b5766b2190fe7d_ibm.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6bc5556b277d750a69_Doordash-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6a9a5cd6110dc622db_Snap-color.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f815d46542504f9cee31_adobe.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f95eb1c857f73c0ec226_paypal.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f9e10d903ef8395e299a_goldmansachs.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b45d72f82c00180d2_Canva-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b22208f1a1fefa8a2_AirBnB-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b22208f1a1fefa817_Stripe-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f6f4bb18a3ca707ac771_linkedin.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6bae7ad199a36794eb_Atlassian-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f76721b5766b2190fe7d_ibm.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6bc5556b277d750a69_Doordash-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6a9a5cd6110dc622db_Snap-color.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f815d46542504f9cee31_adobe.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f95eb1c857f73c0ec226_paypal.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f9e10d903ef8395e299a_goldmansachs.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b45d72f82c00180d2_Canva-BW.svg)
It's not a pipeline problem. **_It's a spotlight problem._**
Tech hiring needs a reset. From prepping for jobs and practicing coding to running a world-class technical interview, give developers the tools they need to showcase their skills, passion, and potential.
Request a demo⟨8⟩
Coding practice
## Explore and expand your skills.
Every idea has a first line of code. Prep for jobs and sharpen your skills alongside a global community of developers. Access the content you need to develop new skills – and land the job you’ve dreamed of.
Sign up and practice⟨30⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/677ff2aeab165414693c62b4_homeOld_community.avif)
Coding tests
## ** _Join the movement._** Screen on skills.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/677ff866cf2a83769a056475_home_ScreenFlip_resume.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/677ff866c82d660447b021cc_home_ScreenFlip_report.avif)
## Leave the binary tree behind
Build coding questions using our library of dev-friendly content that challenges them to solve the problems they’d actually tackle on the job.
Start free trial➜⟨29⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/677ef5d66ffea04944141ab9_screenshot_library-1000.webp)
## Focus on what really matters: the code
Build skills-based coding tests with tech problems a developer would encounter on the job — and hire the team behind your next big idea.
Request a demo➜⟨8⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/677ff27d425b27ee767ac63b_homeOld_integrity.avif)
## Identify top contenders
Identify top contenders and invite them to meet your team using data-driven decisions that help level the playing field for developers everywhere.
Learn more➜⟨10⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/677ff27dd3d7c830d8cfb048_homeOld_report.avif)
TEchnical interviews
Interview like it’s **_2025_**
Ditch out of reach and out of touch interview questions about golf balls and 747s — and turn off your clunky screen share for good. Code, create, and collaborate with an IDE built to showcase real-world skills in a real-world environment.
Learn more⟨11⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787dc6f4b88704569dc3c3a_tool1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787dc6f4a00740c49b4361f_tool2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787dc6f4b87e1badc6f8799_tool3.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787dc6f181c45a97d394319_tool4.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787dc6f40564a6c26a0b475_tool5.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787dc6f638ea2c6880f5974_tool6.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787dc6f3b96d13b975c6088_tool7.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787dbe74f49c6423d3ef5be_interview-2.avif)
### Every company is a tech company. **_We’re here to help them all._**
More than 3,000 tech teams, representing all industries and from countries around the world, trust HackerRank to connect with developers and add cutting-edge skills to their teams.That includes 25% of the Fortune 100 — and that moonshot startup that just came out of stealth.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787ead3bad049acd99c5b3b_ubs_black.png)
We're discovering new ways of attracting candidates to the organization. By using HackerRank, we're actually improving the tech image of UBS.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787eb911a727f0e460c9125_vmware_black.png)
HackerRank has actually allowed us to look for diamonds in the rough that our old process didn't give us the time or resources to look for.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787ec83e5d4dc64866a7f2f_booking_black.png)
We're promoting our jobs to a much wider audience and allowing candidates to be selected for interviews purely based on the merit of their coding abilities.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787ec8376622292b37ba91b_doordash_black.png)
We cut down hiring time by months, which was huge for us. We owe that to HackerRank.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787ec839d5dcda12fec22df_vanguard_black.png)
HackerRank is a critical piece of our candidate's experience, and hitting the right tone is just as important as identifying good candidates.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787ec83b1f12279501097a0_wish_black.png)
HackerRank has been a huge help in making it easy to assess the skills of all the candidates we interview. Without it, the process of scaling our engineering team would have been very cumbersome.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b22208f1a1fefa8a2_AirBnB-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b22208f1a1fefa817_Stripe-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f6f4bb18a3ca707ac771_linkedin.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6bae7ad199a36794eb_Atlassian-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f76721b5766b2190fe7d_ibm.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6bc5556b277d750a69_Doordash-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6a9a5cd6110dc622db_Snap-color.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f815d46542504f9cee31_adobe.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f95eb1c857f73c0ec226_paypal.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f9e10d903ef8395e299a_goldmansachs.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b45d72f82c00180d2_Canva-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b22208f1a1fefa8a2_AirBnB-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6b22208f1a1fefa817_Stripe-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f6f4bb18a3ca707ac771_linkedin.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6bae7ad199a36794eb_Atlassian-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f76721b5766b2190fe7d_ibm.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6bc5556b277d750a69_Doordash-BW.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/673d7a6a9a5cd6110dc622db_Snap-color.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9cef94717176/6787f815d46542504f9cee31_adobe.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b6d7fd4d3e9ce generated_description:
**HackerRank: Elevating Technical Hiring**

**Mission and Focus**: HackerRank aims to "Accelerate the World's Innovation" by transforming the way companies evaluate and hire technical talent. 

**Background**: Founded as a product within Y Combinator's S11 batch, HackerRank serves over 2,800 clients, including more than 25% of the Fortune 100. More than 18 million developers—roughly 40% of the global developer community—use HackerRank to learn and demonstrate their coding abilities. Remarkably, two developers complete a HackerRank submission every second, adding up to about 185,000 submissions daily.

**Location**: Headquartered in Mountain View, California, HackerRank has a dedicated team of around 300 employees. The company is tagged under developer-tools, recruiting, and is a key player in the San Francisco Bay Area tech landscape.

**Products and Services**: 

1. **ASTRA**: Recently, HackerRank introduced ASTRA—an AI benchmark designed to assess large language model performance throughout the software development lifecycle.
   
2. **Core Products**:
   - **Screen**: Streamlines the hiring process, evaluating candidates based on code skills.
   - **Interview**: Facilitates efficient and meaningful technical interviews.
   - **Engage**: Boosts the tech branding efforts of companies to attract talent.
   - **SkillUp**: Aims to enhance the skill sets of tech teams.

**Features**:
- **Certified Assessments**: Quick setup of standardized tests for various roles.
- **Plagiarism Detection**: AI tools that ensure fairness in evaluation.
- **Real-World Questions**: Tests based on real job scenarios.
- **Integrations**: Seamless connections with popular tools to enhance functionality. 

**Insights**: HackerRank addresses what they call a "spotlight problem" in tech hiring, emphasizing a need for robust evaluation methods over traditional pipelines. By focusing on skills, they help companies find "diamonds in the rough," expanding the range of candidates they can consider.

**Community Engagement**: There’s an evident commitment to not only help candidates "sharpen their tech skills" but also to empower organizations to build resilient technical teams. Their offerings encompass resources like a blog, role directories, and industry insights to keep both developers and hiring teams informed about best practices and trends.

**Join the Movement**: HackerRank encourages companies to embrace modern hiring practices by joining their platform, helping to cultivate skills that resonate with job demands.

For more information, visit their website at [HackerRank.com](http://hackerrank.com).
